title: Beginners Guide to KDP Niche Research

tactics.name: demand_check
tactics.description: Evaluate niche demand by analyzing top 10 books' bestseller rank and review counts
steps: Check first 10 books' bestseller rank (BSR) on Amazon
Ensure minimum reviews for top 10 books is 3,000
caveats: Niche with BSR below 100,000 lacks demand
source_quotes: If the first 10 books... averaging bestseller rank of between 3,000 to 45,000... niche doesn't have enough demand

tactics.name: kdp_publisher_check
tactics.description: Identify KDP-published authors by checking the publisher field to avoid competing with traditional publishers.
steps: Check the publisher field in book details
caveats: May fail in highly saturated niches

tactics.name: price_and_entry_barrier
tactics.description: Focus on niches with high prices and high barriers to entry to ensure profitability
caveats: Avoid niches with low price points and low barriers
source_quotes: If you sell 200 books... make over $1,000

heuristics.name: competition_filter
heuristics.condition: If median reviews for top 10 books are below 3,000, niche is less competitive
source_quotes: Minimum between the first 10 books... minimum reviews you have is 3,000

heuristics.name: price_point_heuristic
heuristics.condition: If median reviews in a niche are below 200, prioritize niches with higher price points

heuristics.name: review_threshold_boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize niches with low competition
source_quotes: If you sell 200 books... barely even make up to $100

claims.statement: Amazon's bestseller rank reflects actual purchasing behavior in a niche
source_quotes: Amazon actually makes that the books that are selling very well is what they put at the first page

claims.statement: Trend-based niches are temporary and require constant chasing of new trends
source_quotes: trends always come and go...chasing trend over and over

claims.statement: Book covers significantly impact click-through rates on Amazon KDP
source_quotes: Your book cover is very, very, very important

niche_patterns.description: Combine specific identity, problem, and constraint to create niche with lower competition
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Targets underserved sub-niches with lower review counts
source_quotes: the minimum between the first 10 books that are ranking in that particular keyword, the minimum reviews you have is 3,000
